H0.text: The Saltire is which country's flag. Scotland

H1.text: The Saltire is which country's flag. Norway

H2.text: The Saltire is which country's flag. Iceland

H3.text: The Saltire is which country's flag. H-Alba

A4.text: The flag of Scotland (Scottish Gaelic: bratach na h-Alba; Scots: Banner o Scotland, also known as St Andrew's Cross or the Saltire) is the national flag of Scotland.

A5.text: Use of the flag is first recorded with the illustration of a heraldic flag in Sir David Lyndsay of the Mount's Register of Scottish Arms, c.â€‰1542.
